1440360.name: Tanks in Labyrinth
1440360.description:
Tanks in Labyrinth is a fun multiplayer game where you control a tank. You need to destroy the rest of the players and stay alive yourself. You can play alone or invite up to 3 friends. And the first-person mode will be a pleasant surprise for you.

The game has interesting bonuses that can help you win, or they can, if used poorly, hinder you. For example, the "Wall" bonus, which sets up a wall in front of you, if used correctly, will destroy the enemy with his own bullets, which will fly off from your wall into him.

Also, you will really like the unusual music from Jason Shaw, which will make the game more exciting.
1440360.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
